name: Devidration Triangles?
description:
*MORAL OF GAME*
Basically the bad guys took the magic crystals and you as the player must stop them because they're bad lol
and the bad guys are triangles too :o

*CONTROLS*
You use the joystick to move around
and the shoot button to shoot

unless if you have a mouse and a keyboard that fits with your phone
That's optional..

*INFINITE GAMEMODE*
Play in ten unique levels, and if you die?
you get sent to a different level..
When does it end?
Until your fingers are tired of course

*CAMPAIGN GAMEMODE*
Complete the objectives that is eliminate all enemy triangles and grab the Magic Crystals
and try not to die because that will be embarrassing

2-PLAYERS
If you have a friend then you're in for a treat
because now you can play with your friend
Fight and may the strongest win...
in 2-Players mode there two joysticks and two shoot buttons

Version 0.1
Official release of Devidration Triangles?
